questionnaire.title: Questionnaire for new users
questionnaire.description: When the user first opens an app â€” he should be introduced with a questionnaire to assess better his goals, fitness level, etc. He has an ability to skip the questionnaire

flow.on-start: When the app starts, it should check if the user has answered questionnaire in the local storage(hive) or if he decided to skip it. if he has answered or if he decided to skip - navigate to main screen. Otherwise - navigate to questionnaire page. Doesn't matter if the user is logged in or no - this should be the first screen he sees
flow.on-questionnaire-begin-view: The first screen the user should see should have a brief explanation of why the questionnaire is important and how it will help tailor the app experience to his needs. Say that it contains 12 questions including this one, and takes 3-5 minutes on average. Then, at the bottom there should be two buttons: "Start" or "do it later". Update the choice in local storage

questionnaire-view.section:
Goals & Experience
What is your primary fitness goal? (Select one)
Increase muscle size (Hypertrophy)
Increase strength (Lifting heavier weights)
Improve cardiovascular endurance
Lose weight / Fat loss
Improve overall health and fitness
Recover from an injury (Rehabilitation)
What is your current level of workout experience? (Select one)
Beginner (Little to no experience) Intermediate (I have been working out consistently for at least 6 months.) Advanced (I have been consistently training for over 2 years.)

Health & Safety Have you been diagnosed with any of the following health conditions? (Select all that apply):
Heart disease High blood pressure Diabetes Joint conditions (e.g., arthritis) Respiratory issues (e.g., asthma) Prefer not to say I have none of the above
Do you have any current or past injuries that affect your ability to exercise?
Shoulder Lower back Knee Ankle Wrist Prefer not to say I have no injuries

Availability & Preferences How many days per week can you commit to working out?
1-2 days 3-4 days 5-7 days
How long are your typical workout sessions?
Less than 30 minutes 30-60 minutes 60-90 minutes More than 90 minutes
Which types of exercise do you enjoy?
Weightlifting / Strength training Bodyweight exercises Running / Jogging Swimming Cycling Yoga / Pilates Team sports

question.title: Do you have access to a gym or workout equipment?

options.option: Yes, I have access to a fully equipped gym
Yes, I have some basic equipment at home (e.g., dumbbells, resistance bands)
No, I prefer bodyweight exercises or outdoor activities

flow.on-completion: After the user completes the questionnaire or decides to skip it - save his choice in local storage(hive), send it over api to back end and navigate to main screen

questionnaire.UI: Don't put everything on one screen - split it into multiple sections with one question per view; with a progress indicator at the top. Each section should have a "Next" button to proceed to the next question and "Back" button to return to the previous one. At the end of the questionnaire, provide a "Submit" button to finalize the responses.
